author: Special Correspondent
M Soundariya Preetha
text:
Religion

Shri Bhadarakeri Mutt: Discourse on Sri Vyasaraja songs, Sri Raghavendra Swami Temple, 6 p.m.

Arulmigu Rathina Vinayagar Temple: Ashtami pujas, RS Puram,

7.30 p.m.

General

Coimbatore Vizha: Cinema in Coimbatore heritage walk, 9.30 a.m.; special appearance by Narain Karthikeyan, Jennys Club, 4 p.m.

GKNM Hospital: Diabetic footcare clinic, 2 p.m.

Sankara College of Science and Commerce: Workshop on “Taste of South India”, 10 a.m.

Hindusthan College of Engineering and Technology: Conference on advances in materials and manufacturing, 9 a.m.

Coimbatore Management Association: Lecture on organisational culture, 6.30 p.m.
title: Engagements. Coimbatore city.
